SELECT /* WBIASupplyListMapper.selectSupplyList */ * FROM ( SELECT EPISD_SEQ ,BSN_CD ,YEAR ,EPISD ,ACCS_STRT_DTM ,ACCS_END_DTM , BSN_STRT_DTM , BSN_END_DTM , CASE WHEN NOW() < ACCS_STRT_DTM THEN '접수전' WHEN NOW() >= ACCS_STRT_DTM AND NOW() < ACCS_END_DTM THEN '접수중' ELSE '접수마감' END AS DATE_STATE , CASE WHEN NOW() < ACCS_STRT_DTM THEN 'STATE01' WHEN NOW() >= ACCS_STRT_DTM AND NOW() < ACCS_END_DTM THEN 'STATE02' ELSE 'STATE05' END AS DATE_STATE_CD , CASE WHEN NOW() < ACCS_STRT_DTM THEN '접수대기' WHEN NOW() >= ACCS_STRT_DTM AND NOW() < ACCS_END_DTM THEN '접수중' ELSE '마감' END AS ACCT_STATUS , CASE WHEN NOW() < ACCS_STRT_DTM THEN 2 WHEN NOW() >= ACCS_STRT_DTM AND NOW() < ACCS_END_DTM THEN 1 ELSE 3 END AS DATE_ORD , DATEDIFF(ACCS_END_DTM,NOW()) AS D_DAY ,EXPS_YN ,REG_ID , (SELECT NAME FROM CO_ADM_MST WHERE ID = A.REG_ID) AS REG_NAME ,REG_DTM ,MOD_ID , (SELECT NAME FROM CO_ADM_MST WHERE ID = A.MOD_ID) AS MOD_NAME ,MOD_DTM FROM CX_EPISD_MST A ) A
ORDER BY DATE_ORD, CASE WHEN DATE_ORD = 1 THEN ACCS_END_DTM END, CASE WHEN DATE_ORD = 2 THEN ACCS_STRT_DTM END, CASE WHEN DATE_ORD = 3 THEN CASE WHEN BSN_END_DTM IS NULL THEN ACCS_END_DTM ELSE BSN_END_DTM END END DESC
ORDER BY A.REG_DTM DESC
LIMIT #{firstIndex}, #{recordCountPerPage}

SELECT /* WBIASupplyListMapper.getSupplyListTotCnt*/ COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT EPISD_SEQ ,BSN_CD ,YEAR ,EPISD ,ACCS_STRT_DTM ,ACCS_END_DTM ,BSN_STRT_DTM ,BSN_END_DTM , CASE WHEN NOW() < ACCS_STRT_DTM THEN '접수전' WHEN NOW() >= ACCS_STRT_DTM AND NOW() < ACCS_END_DTM THEN '접수중' ELSE '접수마감' END AS DATE_STATE , CASE WHEN NOW() < ACCS_STRT_DTM THEN 'STATE01' WHEN NOW() >= ACCS_STRT_DTM AND NOW() < ACCS_END_DTM THEN 'STATE02' ELSE 'STATE05' END AS DATE_STATE_CD ,EXPS_YN ,REG_ID , (SELECT NAME FROM CO_ADM_MST WHERE ID = A.REG_ID) AS REG_NAME ,REG_DTM ,MOD_ID , (SELECT NAME FROM CO_ADM_MST WHERE ID = A.MOD_ID) AS MOD_NAME ,MOD_DTM FROM CX_EPISD_MST A ) A

SELECT /* WBIASupplyListMapper.selectSupplyDtl*/ EPISD_SEQ ,BSN_CD ,YEAR ,EPISD ,ACCS_STRT_DTM ,ACCS_END_DTM ,BSN_STRT_DTM ,BSN_END_DTM , CASE WHEN NOW() < ACCS_STRT_DTM THEN '접수전' WHEN NOW() >= ACCS_STRT_DTM AND NOW() < ACCS_END_DTM THEN '접수중' ELSE '접수마감' END AS DATE_STATE ,EXPS_YN ,(SELECT NAME FROM CO_ADM_MST WHERE ID = A.REG_ID) AS REG_NAME ,REG_ID ,REG_IP ,REG_DTM ,(SELECT NAME FROM CO_ADM_MST WHERE ID = A.MOD_ID) AS MOD_NAME ,MOD_ID ,MOD_IP ,MOD_DTM FROM CX_EPISD_MST A WHERE EPISD_SEQ = #{detailsKey}
SELECT /* WBIASupplyListMapper.selectYearDtl */ MIN(YEAR) AS YEAR FROM CX_EPISD_MST

SELECT /* WBIASupplyListMapper.getRoundDtl */ * FROM ( SELECT EPISD_SEQ ,BSN_CD ,YEAR ,EPISD ,ACCS_STRT_DTM ,ACCS_END_DTM ,BSN_STRT_DTM ,BSN_END_DTM ,EXPS_YN , CASE WHEN NOW() < ACCS_STRT_DTM THEN 2 WHEN NOW() >= ACCS_STRT_DTM AND NOW() < ACCS_END_DTM THEN 1 ELSE 3 END AS DATE_ORD FROM CX_EPISD_MST A WHERE BSN_CD = 'BSN09' AND EXPS_YN = 'Y' ) A WHERE DATE_ORD = 1 ORDER BY ACCS_END_DTM, BSN_STRT_DTM ASC LIMIT 1

SELECT /* WBIASupplyListMapper.selectOPtnList */ A.SPLYCHN_STBLZTN_FILE_SEQ as file_seq , (SELECT MAX(FILE_ORD) FROM CO_FILE_DTL WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' AND FILE_SEQ = A.SPLYCHN_STBLZTN_FILE_SEQ) as optn_ord , (SELECT CONCAT(file_dsc,'.',file_extn) FROM co_file_dtl WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' AND file_seq = A.SPLYCHN_STBLZTN_FILE_SEQ) FILE_NM FROM SM_STY_MST A WHERE TYPE_CD = 'BUSINESS02'

SELECT /* WBBARoundMapper.getApplyCount */ COUNT(*) FROM CX_APPCTN_MST A JOIN CX_APPCTN_RSUME_DTL B ON A.appctn_seq = B.appctn_seq AND B.rsume_ord = 1 WHERE EPISD_SEQ = #{episdSeq} AND MEM_SEQ = #{memSeq} AND APPCTN_STTS_CD != 'PRO_TYPE06001_01_004'
